title: fredericktaylor
author: fredericktaylor
content: Bitcoin is a decentralized currency It is very difficult to say whether such coins like Bitcoin will be discovery in the future. But in my opinion such coins will not be another discovery.What is yours opinions?

comments.author: OcTradism
comments.body: Quote from: fredericktaylor on January 09, 2024, 11:19:37 AMBitcoin is a decentralized currency It is very difficult to say whether such coins like Bitcoin will be discovery in the future. But in my opinion such coins will not be another discovery.They created many altcoins and say their coins are Bitcoin killers but those coins die with time. Those coins fail to kill Bitcoin even you talk about Bitcoin Forks.How many Bitcoin Forks are there?Bitcoin is decentralized and it is unique. We did not have another coin among thousand of altcoins can have decentralization like Bitcoin.Discovery, game changer are marketing words, buzz words used by altcoin developers to scam investors.

comments.author: apogio
comments.body: Quote from: fredericktaylor on January 09, 2024, 11:19:37 AMBitcoin is a decentralized currency It is very difficult to say whether such coins like Bitcoin will be discovery in the future. But in my opinion such coins will not be another discovery.What is yours opinions?I am not sure what you mean. There are currently literally more than 10,000 useless altcoins, that's why people call them shitcoins. In my opinion, none of those have anything to offer to the community apart from Monero, which adds some attributes that Bitcoin lacks and make it even more private.Apart from these 2, I don't think any of the other coins are beneficial. They just exist because some people earn money from inventing them.

comments.author: ColdLava40
comments.body: Quote from: fredericktaylor on January 09, 2024, 11:19:37 AMBitcoin is a decentralized currency It is very difficult to say whether such coins like Bitcoin will be discovery in the future. But in my opinion such coins will not be another discovery.What is yours opinions?Well, I don't see the possibility of having any coin that would show similar properties as Bitcoin in the future. Bitcoin happens to be a major part of evolution of money that has changed the financial industry with strong protocols in place. Morever, the entire story behind Bitcoin that has made it a success till this day is kind of complicated, which makes the possibility of having a coin that could hold such dominance nearly impossible.I think most of us are happy with the Bitcoin and we aren't expecting to see any competitor because they won't be any. If there should be any other financial impact that would be coming in the future, then it might likely not be in the form of crypto currency. Bitcoin dominance is nothing to compete with.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.created_time: January 09, 2024, 11:45:45 AMLast edit: January 09, 2024, 11:58:15 AM by pakhitheboss
comments.body: Many have claimed to create a coin better than Bitcoin in the past, and many will continue to do so in the future. They would surely get some attention but eventually die in the long run. It is not possible to sustain the value and rank as Bitcoin has done since its inception. I doubt there will be another coin like Bitcoin in the future and it can grow as Bitcoin has grown in a quindecade.Â  The only thing that is causing issues now is the NFTs that are using its blockchain. If the developers do not do anything then we would need to wait until they cease to exist in the future. Then only we would again witness the transaction fees and network congestion going down. At the moment it is still not looking good and I felt in the past that it might go down but I think now it won't.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Possibly? no one know with the future.Just like cellphone wasn't created yet, I don't think people are expect we can easily send message over and over with internet.Just like Bitcoin wasn't exist yet, I don't think people are expect we can have a decentralized currency to combat against centralization and hedging against inflation.

comments.author: Assface16678
comments.body: What do you mean? There are a lot of coins out there; in the market, there are already coins that are created via the technology of bitcoin, which is blockchain. But to answer your question, it depends on two things. If you are referring to a coin or currency that has another technology, I mean a coin created with a new technology and not driven to blockchain, then I don't think there will be something like that that will emerge. Maybe there is a possibility that as the technology gets more advanced, there is a possibility of new technology emerging. But if you are referring to a coin that will have the same equivalent in terms of price, like bitcoin, well, we will hope for that because more coins like bitcoin, which have a lot of potential and opportunity, mean a profit for us, again another possibility that we hope will happen.

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.body: Quote from: ColdLava40 on January 09, 2024, 11:34:08 AMWell, I don't see the possibility of having any coin that would show similar properties as Bitcoin in the future. Bitcoin happens to be a major part of evolution of money that has changed the financial industry with strong protocols in place. Morever, the entire story behind Bitcoin that has made it a success till this day is kind of complicated, which makes the possibility of having a coin that could hold such dominance nearly impossible.I think most of us are happy with the Bitcoin and we aren't expecting to see any competitor because they won't be any. If there should be any other financial impact that would be coming in the future, then it might likely not be in the form of crypto currency. Bitcoin dominance is nothing to compete with.We can't predict the future, friend. Bitcoin has proven itself as a top cryptocurrency to invest in, but it's not without flaws. Over time, important features like privacy and decentralization have been gradually reduced. We can't guarantee that Bitcoin will always be the best, but it currently holds a strong position, even though many altcoins haven't surpassed its features. The idea is investing in the most profitable and that which provides us with more features and for now, none. We'll have to wait and see if a new coin emerges with more to offer.

comments.author: Mauser
comments.body: Quote from: fredericktaylor on January 09, 2024, 11:19:37 AMBitcoin is a decentralized currency It is very difficult to say whether such coins like Bitcoin will be discovery in the future. But in my opinion such coins will not be another discovery.What is yours opinions?Not sure I understand what you mean. Are wondering that they will create other currencies with limited supply? The advantage of Bitcoin is that there is only a fixed number of coins to be mined, and no person can just decide overnight decide to print a large number of coins. There are already plenty of other alt coins that have the same characteristics. Or do you mean also a project that is going to be as widely accept and successful as Bitcoin? For that I don't think it's realistic at the moment, because bitcoin is just too dominate. The profit all the early investors made with bitcoin is not comparable to other crypto currencies, and which is why all these investors wouldn't switch quickly into another project that wants to overtake bitcoin.

comments.author: BlackHatCoiner
comments.body: "The paradox of cryptocurrencies: Coins are scarce, but currencies abundant."-- Naval. I very much doubt we will ever have another Bitcoin. The technology is here. People are building on top of it. Instead of trying to find the next killer-shitcoin which will "bring the revolution" (AKA, the sweet profits), stack some sats. The only other cryptocurrency I can confidently sell my sats for, is Monero.

comments.author: Smack That Ace
comments.body: No one can know what will happen in the future, so there will always be two possibilities: yes or no. Although many altcoins have been created and all of them are not comparable to bitcoin, it does not mean that in the next 10 years or in the future there will not be another coin better than bitcoin. I like bitcoin but I will not blindly deny the world's extraordinary advancements and inventions. If satoshi could create a decentralized currency like bitcoin, something no government or anyone thought would happen. The same thing may happen in the future.

comments.author: retreat
comments.body: As you said, it is very difficult to find a digital currency like Bitcoin, maybe in the next few decades nothing will be able to replace Bitcoin as a revolutionary digital currency that introduces a blockchain and decentralization system. Even when altcoins like Ethereum or others are pushed by governments or large institutions like Mastercard and manage to beat the valuation and adoption of Bitcoin, they will not be able to replace Bitcoin as the most disruptive currency in the world.

comments.author: Lorence.xD
comments.body: For how long Bitcoin has been on the top of the market, people always tend to say that the coins they are creating are much better than Bitcoin, but no matter how long they've planned the project to invent a new coin that could face with Bitcoin, it hasn't reach Bitcoin's level decentralization, plus the fact that Bitcoin's already ahead of its supply and demand, due to its scarcity it reaches that amount in the market. We still don't know what the outcome in the future, but maybe in the next few years or decades there will be a coin that could reach almost the same as Bitcoin but it would need hype, a good roadmap, a team, etc.
